text: Ej kasone, ki imon ovarded, ʙarpodorandai adl ʙosed va ʙaroi Alloh sahodat dihed, harcand ʙa zijoni xud jo padaru modar jo xesovandoni sumo, ci tavongar va ci tangdast ʙosand. Zero Alloh ʙar on du (sarvatmandu kamʙaƣal) sazovortar (mehruʙontar) ast. Pas az xohishoi nafs pajravi makuned, to az adl ruj gardoned. Cun digar kuned suxanro (ja'ne, nodurust guvohi dihed) jo az on sahodat ruj toʙed, Alloh ʙa har ci mekuned, (oskoru pinhon) ogoh ast
